item.title: Jaimie add a quote by William Paley
item.description: "There is a principle which is a bar against all information, which is proof against all arguments, and which cannot fail to keep a man in everlasting ignorance - that principle is contempt prior to investigation." -- William Paley

item.title: Jaimie add a quote by Vaclav Havel
item.description: "Keep the company of those who seek the truth- run from those who have found it" -- Vaclav Havel

item.title: Jaimie add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Jaimie add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "And the day came when the risk to remain tight in a bud was more painful than the risk it took to blossom." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Jaimie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jaimie add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Jaimie add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "There are two kinds of teachers: the kind that fill you with so much quail shot that you can't move, and the kind that just gives you a little prod behind and you jump to the skies." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Jaimie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Jaimie add a quote by Sara Teasdale
item.description: "You will recognize your own path when you come upon it because you will suddenly have all the energy and imagination you will ever need." -- Sara Teasdale

item.title: Jaimie add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Jaimie add a quote by H.G. Wells
item.description: "Moral indignation is jealousy with a halo." -- H.G. Wells

item.title: Jaimie add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Jaimie add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "I don't know the key to success, but the key to failure is trying to please everyone." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Jaimie add a quote by Henri Nouwen
item.description: "When we honestly ask ourselves which person in our lives mean the most to us, we often find that it is those who, instead of giving advice, solutions, or cures, have chosen rather to share our pain and touch our wounds with a warm and tender hand. The friend who can be silent with us in a moment of despair or confusion, who can stay with us in an hour of grief and bereavement, who can tolerate not knowing, not curing, not healing and face with us the reality of our powerlessness, that is a friend who cares." -- Henri Nouwen

item.title: Jaimie add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "If music be the food of love, play on, Give me excess of it; that surfeiting, The appetite may sicken, and so die." -- William Shakespeare
